body.name: Steamer for Clothes, Portable 15s Fast Heat-up Handheld Travel Steamer, Mini Handheld Clothing Steamer 800W for Garments, Fabric Steam Iron for Home, Office, and Travel
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 mins
features: 【Efficient and Durable Handheld Steamer】New upgraded high-performance handheld steamer one-button simple operation, 15s fast heating, continuous steaming for 8 minutes, 800W mini travel steamer produces soft and durable dry steam, even in an emergency, its powerful and lasting penetrating steam can effectively and quickly get rid of wrinkles on clothes.

【Easy to Use】This professional steamer comes with a 70ml transparent water tank for clear understanding of water volume changes and timely filling. The independent water tank is easy to disassemble and fill, making it easier for you to refill water. Ergonomic handle for comfortable holding, coupled with an extra long 6ft power cord, easy to operate and move the steamer.

【Advanced Technology, Deep Cleaning】Handheld clothing steamer with high temperature bottom plate enhances the ironing effect. Steam at 226-230℉ can deeply clean your clothes, bringing you a thorough cleaning experience. At the same time, the hanging ironing adopts a new 360° non-spill design, which can flexibly get rid of wrinkles without worrying about leakage.

【Small, Portable and Elegant】This steamer is tailored for every business trip or trip. It's lightweight and compact, with a body as light as 1 pound and only the weight of two mobile phones. It comes with a storage bag for easy storage, allowing you to put it in a backpack or suitcase, ensuring that you can keep it refined even when traveling or on business.

【Widely Used in all Fabrics】Portable handheld clothing steamer is the ideal choice for ironing all kinds of clothes, is the ideal companion for home life and business trips. It is suitable for all fabrics, widely used in T-shirts, shirts, coats, wool, denim, curtains, furniture, toys, silk, lace, etc. Note: Garment steamer is designed for 120 volt sockets only.
body.description: Convenient and Efficient Portable Steamer This hand steamer for clothes is designed with ease of use in mind, you can enjoy a convenient and efficient ironing experience, leaving your clothes looking fresh and neat. Wattage: 800W Voltage: 120V (only for 120V country) Preheat Time: 15 seconds Steam Duration: 8 minutes Water Tank Capacity: 70ml Please note that the garment steamer is designed for 120 volt sockets only. After make sure the button state is pop-up, plug in the power supply, and the indicator light is on.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We are committed to providing the highest quality products and support to ensure your satisfaction. We believe that the powerful functional design of this product can provide you with a more exquisite life. We always adhere to the principle of high quality, in purpose of more perfect products to our customers. 1 × Garment steamer 1 × Storage bag 1 × User manual Convenient and Efficient Portable Steamer This hand steamer for clothes is designed with ease of use in mind, you can enjoy a convenient and efficient ironing experience, leaving your clothes looking fresh and neat. Wattage: 800W Voltage: 120V (only for 120V country) Preheat Time: 15 seconds Steam Duration: 8 minutes Water Tank Capacity: 70ml Please note that the garment steamer is designed for 120 volt sockets only. After make sure the button state is pop-up, plug in the power supply, and the indicator light is on.

1. Fill the tank with distilled or pure water (avoid exceeding the maximum water level) 2. Screw up the water tank. Make sure the button state is pop-up state (pop-up state higher, pressed state lower) 3. Plug in the power supply and wait 15 seconds for the indicator to turn off 4. Press the button once, and the steam will eject automatically. During using, light on or off is normal

NOTES: Please add distilled water or pure water, do not add hot water to the tank.After make sure the button state is pop-up state (pop-up state higher, pressed state lower), plug in the power supply (only for 120V country)After the product is powered on, please wait until the indicator is off, and then press the steam switch button.After the indicator light is off for the first time, in subsequent use, the indicator light is on or off, which is a normal use state.For continuous use, the indicator light does not come on because the first use is already heated up.Flattening or straightening the fabric is more effective to steam out the wrinkles.After used, please plug out the power supply or it will continue to heat. The switch is only for turning steam on or off, not a ON/OFF switch.After the product is powered on, users should not leave to avoid accidents.Please keep a certain distance from the steam nozzle during normal operation to avoid being burned by steam.Check that the back of the fabric is breathable so that steam will not on the fabric and wetting it.Please note that there may be rest water in the tank after quality inspection, but this product is not used item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient and Convenient Handheld Steamer
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this handheld steamer, and it has truly exceeded my expectations. Its compact design makes it easy to handle and store, making it a perfect travel companion. The quick heat-up time is a game-changer, allowing me to tackle wrinkles in no time.The steamer delivers a powerful and consistent steam flow, effortlessly removing wrinkles from various fabrics. I appreciate the versatility it offers, working well on everything from delicate silk to sturdy denim. The removable water tank is a convenient feature, making refilling a breeze.Additionally, the ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip during use, and the safety features provide peace of mind. I've used other steamers in the past, but this one stands out for its efficiency and reliability.Overall, I highly recommend this handheld steamer to anyone in need of a portable, reliable solution for keeping their clothes looking fresh and wrinkle-free. It's a worthwhile investment that has simplified my garment care routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkle-Free Anywhere: Portable 15s Fast Heat-up Handheld Steamer
reviews.reviewText: The Portable Handheld Steamer is a game-changer for on-the-go garment care. With an impressive 15-second fast heat-up, this 800W steamer ensures quick and efficient wrinkle removal. Compact and travel-friendly, it's perfect for home, office, and travel use. This mini steam iron delivers professional-quality results, making it a versatile and essential tool for keeping your clothes looking crisp and fresh anytime, anywhere. Say goodbye to wrinkles with the convenience of the Portable Handheld Steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. When I got this steam looks very cute, its easy to use,just like that the function is not complicated and it doesn’t feel heavy in my hand. There is no need to assemble, just add the water and plugged in ,don’t worry about being burned.I have old one it’s not easy use,this is good to try. Also there will be steam under one button,it’s really too simple. The body part is particularly small,and it doesn’t take up much space in a smaller suitcase, which is very suitable for traveling. The steam is particularly large,flat and fast, the heating effects is very good.the quality is good, easy to use and the ironing is fast without hurting the clothes, it’s good to recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this steamer is a travel essential
reviews.reviewText: I'm thrilled with my new portable travel steamer! Its fast heat-up is a game-changer, making it incredibly convenient for quick touch-ups on the go. The handheld design adds to its portability. The performance exceeded my expectations, effortlessly tackling wrinkles and leaving my clothes looking fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars worth the money
reviews.reviewText: What stands out is its versatility – it effortlessly handles various fabrics, leaving them perfectly smooth. The transparent water tank is convenient for keeping an eye on water levels, and the overall build quality is sturdy. The ergonomic design provides a comfortable grip, making the steaming process a breeze.Whether tackling wrinkles at home, in the office, or while traveling, this mini handheld clothing steamer has become my go-to solution. It's a 5-star product that combines portability, efficiency, and excellent results. I highly recommend it for anyone who values a wrinkle-free wardrobe with minimal effort!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The all One-Solution For Wrinkle-Free Bliss!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't have an iron at home, so I stumbled upon this cool steamer that does both ironing and steaming. Took a chance on it, and boy, am I glad I did!This thing's a lifesaver! I love that it can handle both ironing and steaming - makes my life so much easier. It's like a two-in-one magic gadget. I've used it on all sorts of fabrics, and it's been fantastic. From fancy silk shirts to everyday cotton tees, it gets the job done without any fuss.And talk about saving time! It's my go-to when I'm running late or need to spruce up my outfit quickly. Plus, it's super easy to use. No complicated setup, no crazy buttons - just smooth sailing.What's awesome is I can take it wherever I go. So handy for trips or when I need a quick touch-up on the go. And guess what? No need for a bunch of different gadgets anymore. This bad boy does it all.Honestly, getting this steamer was a game-changer for me. It's become an essential part of my routine, and I'm loving the convenience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick, efficient than standard irons
reviews.reviewText: First time getting a steam iron! I loved how quick it was to get my clothes pressed!! Also it was easy since it was more portable, and being smaller, easy to reach wrinkled creases and corners! Love how fast it heated, like literally cut my time in more than half!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aesthetic and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: When I opened the package I was so surprised because is so aesthetic and light weight, so I could easily use for travel. The instructions for use it are so easy and it works like a big one. I would get it again
